text: Ara mumina purusara o mumina narira -- tadera katakajana apara katakajanera bandhu. Tara bhalo kajera nirdesa deya o manda kaja theke nisedha kare, ara tara namaya kayema kare o yakata adaya kare, ara tara allah o tamra rasulake anusarana kare. Era -- allah sighra'i edera karuna karabena. Nihsandeha allah mahasaktisali, paramajnani.
